BLL

Class ContentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • BLL.ContentManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class ContentManager
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Observer
    This class managers is used for additions and removals of MediaItems from the tree structure It provides all events to the TaskList and ContentTree objects from activity from MediaItems

    • Method Detail

      • addItem

        public MediaItem addItem(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String description,
                ComponentType type,
                NodeType nodeType,
                MediaItem parent)
        Adds a new MediaItem to the tree
        Parameters:
        name - Short name of the MediaItem to be displayed in the Tree and TaskLists
        description - Longer description of the item
        type - The component type to be created by the completion of this portion of the tree e.g. video, audio etc.
        nodeType - Type of node to be created e.g. Element or Asset
        parent - The parent node that this is to be attached to

      • removeItem

        public void removeItem(MediaItem item)
        Removes MediaItem passed in from tree
        Parameters:
        item - MediaItem to be removed

      • moveItem

        public void moveItem(MediaItem newParent,
            MediaItem child)
        Move a MediaItem node from one parent to another
        Parameters:
        newParent - the new parent MediaItem to have the child node attached
        child - the child node to be moved to the parent node

      • getFile

        public java.lang.String getFile(MediaItem item)
        Returns location of a file associated with a MediaItem
        Parameters:
        item - MediaItem
        Returns:
        Filename including directory structure of the file

      • getTree

        public MediaItem getTree()
        Return the tree structure
        Returns:
        Root MediaItem node

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable object,
          java.lang.Object arg)
        Receives change updates from MediaItems in the tree
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
        Parameters:
        object - the MediaItem raising the event
        arg - argument parameters passed with the event
